author: blair
msg: Add a new --from option which, if set, will override the -h option
and set the email 'From:' to whatever is provided as the command

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_cl__options): Rephrase help for the '-r' option to include
short descriptions of the BASE, HEAD, COMMITED and PREV revision
keywords.  Help for this option now extends over several lines.

author: kfogel
msg: (svn_time_from_cstring): Unroll the sscanf when converting time from
a string, for better performance in reading entries files.

author: kfogel
msg: Take care of some todo items in cvs2svn:
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py: Remove underscores from delta and repos
imports; thanks to Mike Pilato for the suggestion.
(global, Commit.commit): Use the svn_node_* definitions exported by
svn.util; thanks to Edward S. Marshall <esm@logic.net> for the patch.

author: kfogel
msg: svn_io_dir_make() instead of apr_dir_make(), so that the paths are
